title: Console101
author: Console101
content: For sale is one original 1st edition shadowless Charizard Pokemon card, graded by CGC for a score of 8 out of 10. This is a very rare card and was hard to get! I'm looking to sell it for BTC0.75 and I can negotiate but unfair offers and lowballs will be ignored altogether. See photos in links below.https://imgur.com/a/reH1reD
